column4: please someone help me with it will "sudo apt-get install openoffice" work?
even the one from synaptec makes it with the correct theme
You installed it from the official ubuntu repository right?
i got it from using sudo apt-get install openoffice.org in the terminal
How does your other applications look? Does it look like that too?
i actually installed it last time because my spell check didn't work and someone said reinstalling it might work
Hold on. There might be a package you need to install. Let me search for it.
installed it but still does not help
Play around in the Tools > Options > View or Appearance see if there are any options to change
looks like i just have one theme called Openoffice.org, wasn't there supposed to be more like gnome human and stuff?
If you are talking about the scheme under Appearance, I too only have OpenOffice.org. Yet mine look fine.
